title: Emery's title 'dream' over - but will Villa salvage top-five hopes?
summary: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery has accepted that his side's Premier League title ambitions are no longer realistic. The club now focuses on salvaging their Champions League qualification hopes after recent setbacks.
content: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery concedes his Premier League title "dreams" are over, but will the club resurrect their Champions League hopes?

zh.summary: 阿斯顿维拉主教练乌奈·埃梅里已接受球队英超联赛冠军雄心不再现实的事实。在近期挫折后，俱乐部现在专注于拯救欧冠资格赛的希望。

fr.title: Le "rêve" de titre d'Emery est terminé - mais la Villa pourra-t-elle sauver ses espoirs de top 5 ?
fr.summary: Le manager d'Aston Villa, Unai Emery, a accepté que les ambitions de titre de Premier League de son équipe ne soient plus réalistes. Le club se concentre désormais sur le sauvetage de ses espoirs de qualification pour la Ligue des champions après des revers récents.

es.title: El "sueño" de título de Emery ha terminado - ¿pero puede Villa salvaguardar sus esperanzas de top cinco?
es.summary: El manager del Aston Villa, Unai Emery, ha aceptado que las ambiciones de título de la Premier League de su equipo ya no son realistas. El club ahora se enfoca en salvaguardar sus esperanzas de calificación para la Liga de Campeones después de los reveses recientes.

title: Kompany: Klassiker win deserves its own title

fr.title: Kompany: La victoire du Klassiker mérite son propre titre

es.title: Kompany: La victoria del Klassiker merece su propio título
es.summary: El manager del Bayern Munich, Vincent Kompany, enfatizó la importancia de la victoria de su equipo sobre el Borussia Dortmund en el Der Klassiker. La victoria del derbi alemán fue lo suficientemente sustancial como para justificar un reconocimiento especial según Kompany.

title: Benfica suspend 5 fans for racist acts vs. Madrid

content: Benfica suspended five supporters after an investigation found they engaged in behaviour of a "racist nature" in the club's match with Real Madrid.

title: Barça now punishing late players with 'huge' fines

title: Crew owner exploring Columbus NWSL expansion

title: Derby points record was 'hanging over our heads' - Edwards
summary: Wolves head coach Rob Edwards revealed that the threat of setting the Premier League's worst points record weighed heavily on his team. The 2-0 victory over Aston Villa allowed Wolves to avoid this unwanted distinction and gave Edwards confidence for the run-in.

title: Wolves beat Aston Villa to avoid Premier League fewest-points record
summary: Wolves secured a 2-0 home victory over Aston Villa, avoiding the Premier League's lowest points total record set by Derby County. The win damaged Villa's Champions League qualification prospects while providing Wolves crucial breathing room.

title: All February's done deals, including deadline day, in one place
